To everyones who have issues with the game crashing :
Make sure you put the  client.dll and server.dll files in the c:\...\Portal 2\portal2\bin folder and NOT in the c:\...\Portal 2\bin folder... I made the same mistake at first and the game crashed. Now it works fine.
Thanks
